TEXT.English: Crusade!
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军东征!

TEXT.English: The Pope has called for a Crusade to the Holy Land to defend the Holy City of Jerusalem from the infidel pest. Would you accept your duty, take up your sword, and leave for the Holy Land?
TEXT.Chinese: 教宗发起了一场从该死的异教徒手中保卫圣地耶路撒冷的十字军东征。你想履行你的义务，拿起你的剑并前往圣地？

TEXT.English: By my Honor and in the name of my God I will defend the Holy Land!
TEXT.Chinese: 以我的荣誉与吾主之名起誓，我将誓死捍卫圣地！

TEXT.English: Bribe everyone involved! Err... I mean, would a small monetary contribution (%d1) to the cause suffice?
TEXT.Chinese: Bribe everyone involved! Err... I mean, would a small monetary contribution (%d1) to the cause suffice?

TEXT.English: No, we can't afford to participate in the Crusade in our current situation.
TEXT.Chinese: No, we can't afford to participate in the Crusade in our current situation.

TEXT.English: I will never play a role in this scheme of that snake of a Pope!
TEXT.Chinese: I will never play a role in this scheme of that snake of a Pope!

TEXT.English: Seeing that God's will is not sacred to you, your people lose faith in the Catholic cause!
TEXT.Chinese: 看到上帝的旨意不是神圣的，你们的人民对天主教事业失去信心!

TEXT.English: The Chivalric Orders can't agree with your decision, some soldiers are even abandoning your rule! They plan to go on the Crusade anyway!
TEXT.Chinese: The Chivalric Orders can't agree with your decision, some soldiers are even abandoning your rule! They plan to go on the Crusade anyway!

TEXT.English: Vote for a Leader
TEXT.Chinese: 投票给一个领袖

TEXT.English: Who will you vote for to lead the Crusade?
TEXT.Chinese: 这次十字军东征的领袖选举你会投票给谁?

TEXT.English: The Pope has called for a crusade!
TEXT.Chinese: 教宗发起了一场十字军东征！

TEXT.English: Crusade Leader Chosen:
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军领袖选举:

TEXT.English: [SPACE]was chosen to lead the Crusade!
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]被选为十字军领袖!

TEXT.English: OK
TEXT.Chinese: 确定

TEXT.English: The Pope spreads his influence over the spiritual life of the Catholics, but there are forces more powerful than faith. You have built an empire of wealth and in many ways your political influence extends beyond that of the Pope. You have the opportunity to use that influence and take over command of the Crusade, deviating it to whatever target you find appropriate.[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Chinese: The Pope spreads his influence over the spiritual life of the Catholics, but there are forces more powerful than faith. You have built an empire of wealth and in many ways your political influence extends beyond that of the Pope. You have the opportunity to use that influence and take over command of the Crusade, deviating it to whatever target you find appropriate.[NEWLINE]

TEXT.English: The cost to take over
TEXT.Chinese: 接管的费用

TEXT.English: gold.[NEWLINE]
TEXT.Chinese: 财富.[NEWLINE]

TEXT.English: is the current chosen leader.
TEXT.Chinese: 是当前选择的领袖。

TEXT.English: Wealth or Faith
TEXT.Chinese: 财富或信仰

TEXT.English: Take over the Crusade, for it is wealth that moves the world and profit that rules it.
TEXT.Chinese: 接管十字军，得益于那个规则我们可以用财富来改变世界。

TEXT.English: Do not interfere with the Divine will, money is the root of all evil.
TEXT.Chinese: Do not interfere with the Divine will, money is the root of all evil.

TEXT.English: Corrupt Crusade
TEXT.Chinese: 收买十字军

TEXT.English: Choose a new target for the Crusade!
TEXT.Chinese: 选择一个新的十字军东征目标！

TEXT.English: [SPACE]has used financial power to take control of the Crusade.
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE]has used financial power to take control of the Crusade.

TEXT.English: Under Crusade Attack
TEXT.Chinese: 在十字军攻击下

TEXT.English: The Crusaders under the %s1_civ_adjective leadership of %s2_name have chosen our beautiful city of %s3_city as their target. They will arrive in 3 Turns.
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军在%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_name领导下选择了我们美丽的城市%s3_city作为他们的目标。他们将在三回合后到达。

TEXT.English: We have to prepare our defences!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们必须准备防御!

TEXT.English: Crusaders are leaving under the %s1_civ_adjective leadership of %s2_name to conquer the %s3_civ_adjective city of %s4_city in the name of their god.
TEXT.Chinese: 在%s1_civ_adjective的%s2_name领导下，十字军以他们强大的信念征服了%s3_civ_adjective的%s4_city。

TEXT.English: Our Unit is leaving for the Crusade:
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的部队离开了十字军:

TEXT.English: Our Crusading army successfully arrived near %s1_city_name
TEXT.Chinese: 我们的十字军成功的到达 %s1_city_name

TEXT.English: Our glorious armies ensured that the sacred city of %s1_city_name is safe for all those of the one true faith!
TEXT.Chinese: 我们光荣的十字军战士确保 %s1_city_name 的神圣城市对那些虔诚信徒来说是安全的!

TEXT.English: After successfully capturing the Holy City, Crusaders are returning home:
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军成功夺回圣城后，现正在回国的路上:

TEXT.English: After years of fighting to accomplish their mission, some of our Crusaders are returning home:
TEXT.Chinese: 经过多年的奋斗完成任务, 我们的一些十字军正在回国:

TEXT.English: Our Crusading units return home to their families, strengthening the faith throughout the nation and sharing their warfare experiences.
TEXT.Chinese: Our Crusading units return home to their families, strengthening the faith throughout the nation and sharing their warfare experiences.

TEXT.English: Christian pilgrims are filling the roads of Jerusalem!
TEXT.Chinese: Christian pilgrims are filling the roads of Jerusalem!

TEXT.English: Defensive Crusade
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军防御

TEXT.English: Your Majesty, shall we ask our Holy Father to call on our Catholic brothers and sisters to help us against the infidels?
TEXT.Chinese: 陛下，我们问我们的圣父呼唤我们的天主教兄弟姐妹来帮助我们对抗异教徒?

TEXT.English: YES, let the infidels feel our combined wrath!
TEXT.Chinese: 是的，让这些异教徒们感受到我们暴怒！

TEXT.English: NO, we can crush the scum ourselves!
TEXT.Chinese: 不，我们会自己碾碎这些渣滓!

TEXT.English: The Pope has called for a Crusade to aid
TEXT.Chinese: 教宗号召为十字军东征提供援助

TEXT.English: The Crusaders already arrived in our capital, eager to protect the realm!
TEXT.Chinese: 十字军已经抵达我们的首都，渴望保护王国!
